mapper.insert: insert into public.orders (id, order_number, order_date, ship_date, required_date, freight, sales_tax, transaction_status, error_loc, error_message, fulfilled, isdeleted, ispaid, payment_date, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, shipper_id, payment_id, user_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{freight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transactionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fulfilled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ispaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shipperId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paymentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update public.orders set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ship_date = #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, required_date = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales_tax = #{salesTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, transaction_status = #{transactionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_loc = #{errorLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_message = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fulfilled = #{fulfilled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ispaid = #{ispaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_date = #{paymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, order_number, order_date, ship_date, required_date, freight, sales_tax, transaction_status, error_loc, error_message, fulfilled, isdeleted, ispaid, payment_date, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, shipper_id, payment_id, user_id from public.orders where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
